selectTrajectory.title: SIMPORT
selectTrajectory.recordTrajectorySubtitle: Get notified when information about you could be derived
selectTrajectory.exploreTrajectorySubtitle: Interactively explore your own and others whereabouts

diary.title: Diary
diary.noEntryDescription: It seems like you haven't written anything down yet…
diary.deleteEntryAlertMessage: Are you sure to delete this diary entry?

explore.title: Exploration
explore.poiTimetableDescription: The timetable visualizes frequent visits of selected POIs for each weekday. Select an identified POI and explore when you have visited it in the past.

map.title: Map

error.tooManyCoordinates: Trajectory couldn't be analyzed, because it has too many coordinates
error.noInferencesFound: No inferences were found within your trajectory

map.predictionSuccess.singular: We think that you will visit the highlighted place in the next hour
map.predictionSuccess.plural: We think that you will visit the highlighted places in the next hour
map.predictionFail: We couldn't make a prediction for the next hour

tracking.title: Tracking
tracking.notSupported: This platform doesn't support background location tracking
tracking.androidBatteryHint: In order for this app to work correctly, you should disable battery optimizations in the settings for this app. For more information check this site
tracking.alwaysAllowHint: For best tracking results enable always allow for this app in your
